sentences.sContent: You know I have no intention of being awkward and obstreperous.
sentences.sCn: 你知道我无意存心作对。

synos.tran: 吵闹的，喧嚣的；难驾驭的

remMethod.val: ob + streper (喧闹) + ous → 喧嚣的

trans.tranCn: 吵闹的，喧嚣的；难驾驭的
trans.tranOther: If you say that someone is obstreperous, you think that they are noisy and difficult to control
